Context:
The School of Work and College Preparation at George Brown College offers students a variety of employment opportunities based on their interests and previous experience. Alumni from this school can be found in industries such as food preparation and construction. Some students go on to qualify for other George Brown programs, including Hospitality and Culinary Arts, Business Administration, and Social Service Worker.

Contact Information:
- Phone: 416-415-2000
- TTY: 1-877-515-5559
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- Social Media Hub: [Visit Here](Link_to_social_media_hub)

Note: It is important to verify program requirements and fees with the college directly. The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty.
